transArray.content: It is very close to Chaoyang Railway Station. The breakfast is quite rich. Parking is free. The location of the hotel is also very easy to find. You can also do self-service laundry on the first floor. You can get laundry detergent for free at the front desk. It is very convenient. Recommended

Hello dear, thank you for your affirmation of our work. The hotel is disinfected every day, and every detail of my location has been wiped with alcohol, so you can feel at ease in the room. There is Beijing Chaoyang Railway Station 700 meters away from the hotel. , it is very convenient to travel and is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. It is your best choice for travel. There is nothing you can’t think of and nothing you can’t find. We look forward to your next visit!
